messagebundle.msg: How many days ago did you last water the plants? Service the car? Give those grubby kids a bath? Or perhaps had a drink? Use this as a type of time management tool, reminder, or counter.
Can't add reminders. iGoogle storage limit

"Put out recycling","Changed clothes rather than use more heat or air","Unplugged appliances not in use","Swapped in an energy-efficient lightbulb","Carpooled","Donated unused items to charity","Showered quickly","Rode a bike instead of driving","Chose a product with the least packaging","Changed house air filters","Chose locally-grown food","Checked tire pressure"
